item.title: Edit:Need teleport help please
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

this isn’t the right code. this is for the coordinates of the little dialogue thingy.
you see the case is the thing you click… for example.
tele1
tele2
tele3

case 9167 does the command for what tele1 does, 9168 does the command for what tele2 does and 9169 does the command for tele3.
this is fairly simple to understand.
just take out the
c.triggerTele(3244, 3518, 0);// Varrock Wild
and it wont teleport.
and make sure to look for the dialogue thing, it should be in your client.java if i’m correct.
search what it says for the teleport in there. if it has a //blah blah
that means nothing i’m pretty sure it should be in brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: Edit:Need teleport help please
item.dc:creator: @doup22 doup22
item.description:
@doup22 wrote:

Ok so 1 of my teleports is pking and i wanna get rid of the 3 pk places and make it 1 teleport… i also wanna do that for ancient teleports…
Then i wanna add the pk teleports to a portal along with the interface. Can anyone tell me what i have to delete? heres the code:
1 MORE THING THE ABYSS TELE WAS JUST IN THERE ITS NOT A PK TELE I WANNA KEEP THAT!

case 9167: if(c.teleEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(3296, 3649, 0);// hills c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); if(c.teleEffect == 2) c.triggerTele(3039, 4834, 0);// Abyss c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break; case 9168: if(c.teleEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(3244, 3518, 0);// Varrock Wild c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); if(c.teleEffect == 2) c.closeInterface(); break; case 9169: if(c.teleEffect == 1) c.triggerTele(2539+misc.random(2), 4716+misc.random(2), 0);// Mage Bank c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break; case 17111: c.closeInterface();

If someone could tell me how to make it 1 teleport that would be great and to also add that same stuff to a portal and if you need code for ancients let me know! Please and Thank you

Read full topic
